directions.step:
1. COMBINE POWDERED SUGAR, BUTTER OR MARGARINE, SALT, BOILING WATER AND FLAVORING, ALMOND; MIX UNTIL SMOOTH.
2. SPREAD GLAZE OVER BAKED SWEET ROLLS OR COFFEE CAKES. COAT OR DIP FRIED DOUGHNUTS IN GLAZE. :
NOTE: THIS GLAZE MAY BE USED FOR A VARIETY OF SWEET DOUGH PRODUCTS (SEE RECIPE NO. D-G-7, GUICE FOR SWEET DOUGH MAKE-UP) OR DOUGHNUTS (SEE RECIPE NOS. D-18 OR D-19).
Recipe Number: D04601
SERVING SIZE: 2 TABLESPO
